abstract: Members of environmental and religious organizations march to Pope Francis' weekly Sunday address in St Peter's Square to thank him for his encyclical, strongly worded address on climate change; many hope encyclical will influence world leaders to reach binding comprehensive global accord on greenhouse gas emissions at December 2015 United Nations summit meeting on climate change.
lead_paragraph: An array of global environmental and religious organizations marched to the Vatican to show their support for the pope’s encyclical.

headline.main: Climate Marchers Gather to Show Rousing Support for Pope
headline.print_headline: Marchers Back Pope for Views on Climate

snippet: An array of global environmental and religious organizations marched to the Vatican to show their support for the pope’s encyclical.
